description: create a virtual URI mapping in a light module
option-lightModule-description: set the light module for the virtual URI mapping; defaults to the directory specified in mgnl.config.js file
option-fromUri-description: set the pattern to match in the requested URI; defaults to an empty string
option-toUri-description: map the request to a concrete URI; following action prefixes are supported: 'redirect:', 'permanent:' and 'forward:'; defaults to an empty string
option-prototypeDir-description: use the specified path to the custom prototype templates directory as the prototype source for virtual URI mapping creation

option-prototype-description.withPrototypes: select a prototype for virtual-uri creation; available prototypes include: [{{prototypes}}]
option-prototype-description.noPrototypes: select a prototype for virtual-uri creation; provided prototype-dir: "{{path}}" doesn't exist, no prototypes available

error-virtual-uri-already-exists: Virtual URI mapping "{{name}}" already exists at: {{path}}
error-invalid-action: Invalid action specified for toUri argument; expected one of: 'redirect:', 'permanent:', 'forward:'
error-prototype-file-does-not-exist: The file "{{fileName}}" doesn't exist at: {{path}}; ensure that it is located in your prototype directory
error-failed-to-create-file: Failed to create Virtual URI mapping; {{errorMessage}}
